import React from "react" import DirectoryMenuItem from "./directory-menu-item-style" import CustomButton from "../custom-button/CustomButton" import { motion } from "framer-motion" const motionEffect = `animate = {{ y: -70, }} transition = {{ duration: 1 }}` const DirectoryMenuItemComponent = (props) => { return

{props.object.title.toUpperCase()}

{props.object.description}

} export default DirectoryMenuItemComponent
